metadata.description: An Inhuman with the ability to predict the future has helped the heroes of the Marvel Universe clamp down on crime before it can even happen. While this thwarts most criminals, one man has found a way to keep doing what he does best. Wilson Fisk has managed to stay one step ahead of the good guys and his crime enterprise is BOOMING. But what's his secret?! It's a gritty, street-level view of CIVIL WAR II starring the Kingpin in a world without crime!
metadata.name: Civil War II: Kingpin
